ul.li: Experiments and observations made with the view of improving the art of composing and applying calcareous cements and of preparing quick-lime: theory of these arts; and specification of the author's cheap and durable cement, for building, in crustation or stuccoing, and artificial stone. By Bry. Higgins, M.D.

Higgins.
